competition_summary.context: competition, please refer to Item 1A. “Risk Factors.” HUMAN CAPITAL We are a purpose-driven global workforce of approximately 51,000 colleagues with a significant average tenure reflecting a strong, engaged culture. Our colleagues are committed to serving our customers and enabling them to provide the highest quality patient care. Our values emphasize safety for patients, customers, and colleagues; servant leadership with unyielding integrity; and fostering an inclusive culture and diverse team
